title: FORGE启动后，客户端崩溃
author: tondyfinal

replies.author: VSdadadada
replies.txt_content: 你装了OptiFine pre13吧（我猜的），不兼容Forge，到https://optifine.net/adloadx?f=p ... 2_HD_U_G1_pre17.jar下载，再更新一下Forge，到https://files.minecraftforge.net ... 1.2.0-installer.jar下载

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
更新一下OptiFine和Forge
 Optifine下载地址 https://optifine.net/adloadx?f=p ... 2_HD_U_G1_pre17.jar

replies.author: tondyfinal
replies.txt_content: 的确是兼容的问题，修改后就可以了
